properties.name: application.data-population.enabled
properties.description: Decide if data population step should be executed when starting the application.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Used to salt the JWT token.

properties.name: jwt.accessToken.expiration
properties.description: Set the JWT access token duration in milliseconds.

properties.name: jwt.refreshToken.expiration
properties.description: Set the JWT refresh token duration in milliseconds..
